headline: The Andersons, Inc. Reports Second Quarter Results and Acquires Full Ownership Interest in The Andersons Marathon Holdings LLC
summary: The Andersons, Inc. (Nasdaq: ANDE) announces financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025. Additionally, the Company announces it has acquired the full ownership interest in The Andersons Marathon Holdings LLC (TAMH).

headline: HAHN ACQUIRES EMIC COMMUNICATIONS
summary: Hahn, one of the largest marketing and PR firms in Texas, has successfully acquired Emic Communications and has tapped Emic's founder, Destin Singleton, to run its Energy and Power practice. The move is Hahn's fifth acquisition, strengthening the firm's expertise in the energy and power sectors. Singleton's crisis communication experience also adds to Hahn's well-established crisis communications practice. Specific terms of the acquisition deal points were not disclosed.

headline: Gear Up for Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Q2 Earnings: Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Get a deeper insight into the potential performance of Marathon Petroleum (MPC) for the quarter ended June 2025 by going beyond Wall Street's top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining the estimates for some of its key metrics.
